maqras.text: Wo ceng shi yiselie ren duhai, yushi falao he ta de jundui canbao de zhuigan tamen, zhidao ta jiang bei yan si de shihou, ta cai shuo:“Wo quexin, chu yiselie ren suo gui xinzhe wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; tongshi, wo shi yige shuncong zhe.”
Xianzai (ni cai gui xin) ma? Yiqian ni que yi weikang mingling, erqie shi yige pohuai de ren
Dan jinri wo zhengjiu ni de yiti, yibian ni zuo houlai zhe de jianjie. Duo shu de ren, duiyu wo de jianjie que shi hushi de

Wo que yi shi yiselie ren juzhu zai yige anding di difang, bing yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen. Tamen de yijian meiyou fen qi, zhidao na zhong zhishi jianglin tamen. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi jiang panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei

Jiaruo ni huaiyi wo suo jiang shi ni de jingdian, ni jiu wen wen naxie changchang songdu zai ni zhiqian suo jiang shi de tian jing de renmen. Cong ni de zhu fachu de zhenli, que yi jianglin ni, gu ni qie mo juyu huaiyi zhe de hanglie
qie mo juyu fouren an la de jixiang zhe de hanglie, yizhi ni ru yu kui she zhe zhi zhong
Bei ni de zhu de panci suo panjue de ren, biding bu xindao
Jishi mei zhong jixiang dou jianglin tamen, zhidao tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa

Weihe meiyou yige chengshi de jumin xinyang zhengjiao, yin'er huode xindao de biyi ne? Dan you nu si de zongzu, dang tamen xindao de shihou, wo ceng wei tamen jiechule jinshi shenghuo zhong lingru de xingfa, bing shi tamen zhanshi xiangshou
Ruguo ni de zhu yiyu, da dishang suoyou de ren, biding du xindaole. Nandao ni yao qiangpo zhongren dou zuo xinshi ma
Renhe ren dou bu hui xindao, chufei feng'an la de mingling. Ta yi xingfa jia yu buming li de renmen
Ni shuo:“Nimen yao guancha tiandi zhi jian de sen luo wanxiang. Yi qie jixiang he jinggao zhe, duiyu bu xindao de minzhong shi hao wu biyi de
Tamen zhi dengdai zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe suo zao di na zhong kunan rizi.” Ni shuo:“Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yiqi dengdai de.”
Sihou, wo zhengjiule wo de shizhemen he xindao de renmen, wo jiang zheyang fuze zhengjiu yiban xinshi
Ni shuo:“Renmen a! Ruguo nimen huaiyi wo de zongjiao, name, wo bu chongbai nimen she an la er chongbai de, dan wo chongbai an la, ta jiang shi nimen shou zhong. Wo fengming zuo yige xindao zhe
bing (fengming shuo):‘Ni yingdang quxiang zhengjiao, ni qie mo zuo yige yi wu pei zhu de ren
qie mo she an la er qidao na duiyu ni ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi. Jiaruo ni nayang zuo, ni jiu biding shi yige bu yi de ren.’

Ruguo an la xiang yidian zaihai yu ni, name, chu ta zhi wai, jue wuneng jiechu zaihai de. Ruguo ta jiang fuli yu ni, name, renhe ren ye buneng zulan ta de enhui. Ta ba na enhui jiang yu tasuo yiyu de puren. Ta shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.”
Ni shuo:“Zhongren a! Cong nimen de zhu fachu de zhenli, que yi jianglin nimen. Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Wo bushi jianhu nimen de.”
Ni yingdang zuncong ni suo shou de qishi, bing yingdang jianren, zhidao an la panjue, ta shi zui gongzheng de panjue zhe
Ai lie fu, lia mu, la yi. Zhe shi yi bu jie wen jingque erqie xiangming de jingdian. Shi cong zhi rui de, che zhi de zhu jiang shi de
(Ni shuo):“Nimen zhi yingdang chongbai an la, wo que shi feng ta de mingling lai jinggao nimen, bing xiang nimen baoxi de

Nimen yingdang xiang nimen de zhu qiurao, ranhou, xiang ta huiguo, ta jiu shi nimen huode youmei de xiangshou, dao yige qixian, bing shangci you meide zhe yi daliang de enhui. Ruguo nimen weibei zhengdao, name, wo dique danxin nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa
Nimen zhi guiyu an la, ta dui wanshi que shi quanneng de.”

Zhen de, tamen dique xionghuai yuanhen, yibian yinman an la. Zhen de, dang tamen yong yifu zhegai xiongbu de shihou, an la zhidao tamen suoyinhui de he tamen suo biaobai de, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de
